Description: Core data backbone for CAOS: exposes ops data from all 02-20 subsystems and ingests CAOS insights.
Consumes aircraft state (position, speed, config, fuel/H2) via IMA/data buses for EFB functions.
Consumes ground WiFi / connectivity services and update infrastructure from support systems.
Provides high-level ops usage events for recording and analytics.
Uses H2 tank level/pressure/temperature and provides CG and load constraints (advisory).
Consumes cabin layout / payload station data for W&B calculations.
Consumes FMS route and state; outputs advisory speeds/profiles to avionics.
Consumes NN performance predictor models defined and governed in ATA 95.
Coordinates turnaround with GSE availability, capabilities and scheduling.
Consumes H2 refuelling system constraints and status for ground ops planning.
Exchanges flight plans and routing constraints with avionics/FMS.
Consumes airport and ground infrastructure data used in planning.
Interfaces with AOC/AOC gateway hosted in avionics environment where applicable.
Consumes aircraft trajectory for overlays; provides graphical weather data to cockpit systems.
Uses weather NN models documented in ATA 95 for predictive turbulence/hazard products.
Consumes raw FDR/maintenance data; provides curated ops events/KPIs.
Provides historical datasets to CAOS and consumes annotations/analysis results.
Provides crew ops events for logging and post-flight analysis.
Consumes cabin/communications system capabilities for crew comm tools.
Coordinates H2 refuelling/conditioning profiles with tank system capabilities.
Coordinates with H2 GSE (trucks/plants) on readiness, flow and safety conditions.
Consumes ECS and cabin comfort data to assess passenger experience.
Integrates with IFEC/cabin network to support passenger-facing services.
Uses NN/RL models defined under ATA 95 and feeds back performance metrics and drift indicators.
Consumes historical recorded data to train and refine predictive models.
Implements CAOS predictive use cases and returns predictions and recommended actions.
